# XPC_API_VERSION

**Global Variable**

The version of the XPC API.

## Declaration

```swift
var XPC_API_VERSION: Int32 { get }
```

## Version Details

- **IPHONE_SIMULATOR_HOST_MIN_VERSION_REQUIRED**: The minimum required Simulator host version.
